channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Ignidash
item.description:
Ignidash

An open-source, AI-powered alternative to ProjectionLab for planning your long-term personal finances. Features include monte carlo simulations, historical backtesting, US tax estimation, and AI chat & insights.
item.content:encoded:
Ignidash

An open-source, AI-powered alternative to ProjectionLab for planning your long-term personal finances. Features include monte carlo simulations, historical backtesting, US tax estimation, and AI chat & insights.

item.title: RustFS
item.description:
RustFS

2.3x faster than MinIO for 4KB object payloads. RustFS is an open-source, S3-compatible high-performance object storage system supporting migration and coexistence with other S3-compatible platforms such as MinIO and Ceph.
item.content:encoded:
RustFS

2.3x faster than MinIO for 4KB object payloads. RustFS is an open-source, S3-compatible high-performance object storage system supporting migration and coexistence with other S3-compatible platforms such as MinIO and Ceph.

item.title: Will be done
item.description:
Will be done

Self-hosted, offline-first, open source kanban task manager for visual weekly planning with drag & drop everything and vim keybindings.
item.content:encoded:
Will be done

Self-hosted, offline-first, open source kanban task manager for visual weekly planning with drag & drop everything and vim keybindings.

item.title: FrankMD
item.description:
FrankMD

Self-hosted, Simple Markdown Web Editor and Notes Organizer.
With Hugo blog post support - create posts with proper directory structure.
item.content:encoded:
FrankMD

Self-hosted, Simple Markdown Web Editor and Notes Organizer.
With Hugo blog post support - create posts with proper directory structure.

item.title: Haven
item.description:
Haven

Self-hosted private chat — your server, your rules. No cloud, no telemetry, no Big Tech. Discord alternative that runs on your own machine.
item.content:encoded:
Haven

Self-hosted private chat — your server, your rules. No cloud, no telemetry, no Big Tech. Discord alternative that runs on your own machine.

item.title: Docktail
item.description:
Docktail

Expose Docker containers as Tailscale Services using label-based configuration.
This is probably the docker image we’ve been waiting for. Easily expose docker containers to tailscale. No need for Tailscale sidecar.
item.content:encoded:
Docktail

Expose Docker containers as Tailscale Services using label-based configuration.
This is probably the docker image we’ve been waiting for. Easily expose docker containers to tailscale. No need for Tailscale sidecar.

item.title: Oxi Cloud
item.description:
Oxi Cloud

☁️ Ultra-fast, secure & lightweight self-hosted cloud storage — your files, photos, calendars & contacts, all in one place. Built in Rust.
item.content:encoded:
Oxi Cloud

☁️ Ultra-fast, secure & lightweight self-hosted cloud storage — your files, photos, calendars & contacts, all in one place. Built in Rust.

item.title: OpenWA - WhatsApp API gateway
item.description:
OpenWA - WhatsApp API gateway

OpenWA is a free, open-source WhatsApp API Gateway designed for developers who need full control over their messaging infrastructure—without vendor lock-in or hidden paywalls.
item.content:encoded:
OpenWA - WhatsApp API gateway

OpenWA is a free, open-source WhatsApp API Gateway designed for developers who need full control over their messaging infrastructure—without vendor lock-in or hidden paywalls.

item.title: May - Fuel Log Monitor
item.description:
May - Fuel Log Monitor

May is a web-based dashboard application that gives you a neat and clean interface for logging your fuel fill-ups for all of your vehicles. The application has full multi-user support, as well as multiple vehicles per user. Whenever you fill-up your car or motorcycle, keep the receipt and record the data in May.
item.content:encoded:
May - Fuel Log Monitor

May is a web-based dashboard application that gives you a neat and clean interface for logging your fuel fill-ups for all of your vehicles. The application has full multi-user support, as well as multiple vehicles per user. Whenever you fill-up your car or motorcycle, keep the receipt and record the data in May.

item.title: Iron Pad
item.description:
Iron Pad

Ironpad is a local-first, file-based project management system I’ve been building with AI. Rust backend (Axum), Vue 3 frontend, markdown files as the database, Git integration for versioning.
item.content:encoded:
Iron Pad

Ironpad is a local-first, file-based project management system I’ve been building with AI. Rust backend (Axum), Vue 3 frontend, markdown files as the database, Git integration for versioning.
